Events that occurred on 20 April.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1893 - Christopher Wiseman, the only of Tolkien's friends that survived World War I, is born.
1937 - Narrator George Takei is born.
1939 - Writer and screenwriter Peter S. Beagle is born.
1943 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 48.
1964 - Actor Andy Serkis is born.
1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Dr. Denis Tolhurst.
1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to John Higgins.
1999 - Actor Elan Garfias is born.
2010 - The Lord of the Rings Online developer Turbine is bought by Warner Bros.
2011 - The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game was released.
2013 - Artist Quinton Hoover dies.
2015 - Voice actor Peter Howell dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this day.
